tool_description: This API will provide real-time news about climate change in the world.
name: Climate Change Realtime
title: Climate Change Realtime

api_list.name: Get single / specific news details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-realtime1.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-realtime1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-realtime1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-realtime1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all real-time climate changed news
api_list.description: Get all real-time climate changed news from worldwide.
